events.message: The insured reported an auto accident involving their vehicle hitting a tree on April 30th, 2024. Initial claim filing completed.
Based on the description, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to collision with an object causing vehicle damage.
Agent Michael Rogers was assigned to manage the claim and maintain communication with the insured regarding next steps.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the investigation process ahead.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and a copy of the insured driver's license for claim validation.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including the police report and vehicle repair estimate for review.
Investigation team began assessing the claim details and verifying damages against submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming accident details and verified the repair cost estimate submitted by the insured.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured in the amount of $4,500 based on the damage assessment.
The customer responded positively, agreeing to the proposed settlement amount and thanking the claims team.
Claims department approved the settlement and authorized payment to be issued promptly to the insured.
Payment of $4,500 was disbursed to the insuredâ€™s bank account as per approved settlement terms.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation of receipt of payment and completion of repair.
All claim files and correspondence were archived in the system for future reference and audit purposes.
